andromeda.why: Shock/chaos at the start is raw adaptation, not liberation/rescue action.

arcturus.why: Stabilize turbulence, build a workable base, contain the spike—classic Arcturan crisis-structure setup.

draco.why: Early chaos can trigger dominance grabs or status policing when safety feels scarce.

orion-dark.why: Reflex to impose rigid rules to stop the chaos—control-first response.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal: hold courage and discipline while order is forged from disorder.

pleiades.why: Gentle attunement/soothing stabilizes bonds during the messy beginning.

sirius.why: No sacred-instruction vector yet—this is pre-teaching stabilization.

arcturus.why: Private specialist engineering: elegant quick fixes and interference control are Arcturan field-tech.

draco.why: Stress can provoke pecking-order behavior or hard-edged gatekeeping.

orion-dark.why: Temptation to force compliance for the sake of speed/stability.

orion-light.why: Improvisation under pressure as trial—finding the honorable, workable move.

pleiades.why: Keeping bonds intact and soothing fray while solutions take hold.

andromeda.why: Gritty resilience through failures isn’t liberation work.

arcturus.why: Diagnostic stress-testing to evolve toward functional order—Arcturan calibration.

draco.why: Frustration can tilt into competitive posturing or rank-defensiveness.

orion-dark.why: Forcing premature conformity to ‘the plan’ to avoid more mess.

orion-light.why: Initiatory grind: repeated trials forge right order from chaos.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to feedback/belonging shapes adaptive iteration.

sirius.why: Self-forging phase, not transmission of cosmic law.

arcturus.why: Translate unstable beginnings into stable protocol and anchors—Arcturan hallmark.

draco.why: Success can attract clique enforcement or status gating.

orion-dark.why: Risk of ossifying ‘what works’ into rigid doctrine/hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Mentoring by steadiness—others pass a quiet ordeal aligning to order.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement helps translate chaos into usable norms.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-procedure: codifying the lesson as protocol transmits higher order.

andromeda.why: Being cast as fixer/scapegoat is projection dynamics, not liberation action.

arcturus.why: ‘Make this broken system work for everyone’ → burnout-healer/scapegoat load (Arcturan shadow).

draco.why: Crisis can invite dominance tactics and blame hierarchies.

orion-dark.why: Projection funnels into compliance with authority or doctrinal fixes.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection is a subtle ordeal of staying true to what actually works.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing/containment soothing can overextend and enable scapegoating.

sirius.why: Boundary-testing moment, not a teaching-transmission event.

andromeda.why: Long-view evolution stance isn’t a direct anti-oppression mission.

arcturus.why: Understands how chaotic starts mature into durable forms—evolution architect/system stabilizer.

draco.why: Authority aura can drift into status preservation or hard gatekeeping.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine-lock: over-fixing structure into rigid hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Elder trial: holding patience/discipline as forms ripen—initiatory steadiness.

sirius.why: Transmits matured wisdom: how to move from chaos to lasting order—royal instruction by example.
